results.name: The rumor constant: decimal expansion of the number x defined by x*e^(2 - 2*x) = 1.

formula: Solution to x*exp(2 - 2*x) = 1 with x not equal to 1.
Constant c satisfies: exp(c*x)/(1-2*c) = Sum_{n>=0} (x + 2*n)^n * exp(-2*n)/n!. - _Paul D. Hanna_, Mar 12 2016
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 03 2005
